textFilterFields.description: Fields used by the text filter.

countDisabled.description: Disable fetching a total records number (on the list view).

fullTextSearchOrderType.description: How to order result of full-text search.

optimisticConcurrencyControl.description: Enables optimistic concurrency control for the entity type.

skipRebuild.description: To skip database table creation for the entity type.

noDeletedAttribute.description: Do not add the `deleted` attribute. Soft-deletes will be impossible.

deleteId.description: Adds `deletedId` attribute. An random ID is written there on soft-deletes. As of v8.4.

entityClassName.description: An entity. Should implement Espo\ORM\Entity. Usually should extend Espo\Core\ORM\Entity. As of v8.2.

repositoryClassName.description: A repository. Should implement Espo\ORM\Repository\Repository. As of v8.2.

maxItemLength.description: Max item length. If greater than 100, than storing array values must be explicitly disabled. As of v9.1.

storeArrayValues.description: To store values in the ArrayValue table. Enables search capabilities. Enabled by default.

preview.description: Show the preview button. Applicable only if Markdown is enabled. As of v9.0.

displayRawText.description: Display raw text. Disables Markdown support.

seeMoreDisabled.description: If not true, then long texts will be shortened.

cutHeight.description: A text higher then a specified value will be cut with a 'show more' button displayed.

attachmentField.description: An attachment-multiple field to connect with. As of v9.0.

maxLength.description: The max length of the database column.

pattern.description: A regular expression to check a field value against. If starts with $, a predefined named expression will be used.

before.description: Before a field. To validate that the date should be before the date specified in another field.

after.description: After a field. To validate that the date should be after the date specified in another field.

afterOrEqual.description: Allow an equal date for 'after' validation.

audited.description: Changes of audited fields are logged in the stream.

conversionDisabled.description: Don't convert currency when the convert-currency action is applied for an entity.

decimal.description: Use the decimal type for more precision.

field.description: A field if the foreign entity type.

relateOnImport.description: When importing the field, a matching foreign record will be related with an imported record.

entity.description: An entity type. To be specified if there's no corresponding link defined.

notStorable.description: The field will be marked as not-storable, a DB column won't be created.

readOnly.description: Read-only fields are stripped from a payload received from the front-end. Fields are not editable.

readOnlyAfterCreate.description: The field will become read-only after the record is created. Read-only fields are stripped from a payload received from the front-end. Fields are not editable.

view.description: A custom field view. If not specified, then a value from metadata > fields > {fieldType} > view is used.

index.description: To create a DB index for the field.

dbType.description: Overrides the type of the DB column.

utility.description: The field will be hidden from a user on the UI but not disabled.

tooltip.description: Enable a tooltip for the field. A tooltip text is taken from the language by: {EntityType} > tooltips > {fieldName}. If defined as a string, then text will be taken from the language by: {EntityType} > tooltips > {value}.

forceValidation.description: Always to perform validation, regardless whether field values are sent. As of v8.2.

validatorClassNameMap.description: Validators defined as validation-type => class-name map. Classes should implement Espo\Core\FieldValidation\Validator interface. If not defined for a type, metadata > fields > {fieldType} > validatorClassNameMap > {type} is used.

validatorClassNameList.description: A list of additional validators. Should implement Espo\Core\FieldValidation\Validator interface.

validationList.description: A custom validation list for the field. Use this parameter to re-define validations applied for a specific field. By default, validations for a field type are applied.

mandatoryValidationList.description: A custom mandatory validation list for the field. Use this parameter to re-define mandatory validations applied for a specific field. By default, mandatory validations for a field type are applied.

suppressValidationList.description: Validations to be bypassed for the field.

sanitizerClassNameList.description: A list of sanitizers. Should implement Espo\Core\FieldSanitize\Sanitizer.

sanitizerSuppressClassNameList.description: A list of sanitizers to be suppressed.

customizationDisabled.description: Disables the ability to customize the field in the Entity Manager tool.

fieldManagerParamList.description: Parameters available in the Entity Manager tool when editing the field. Specify an empty array to disable all parameters.

layoutAvailabilityList.description: A list of layout types there the field should be available. Specify an empty array to disable in all layouts.

layoutIgnoreList.description: A list of layout types the field won't be available in. As of v8.2.

orderDisabled.description: Disables the ability to order by the field.

textFilterDisabled.description: Disables the ability to add the field to text filters (in the Entity Manager tool).

directAccessDisabled.description: Indicates that the field value is not accessed directly but through some additional logic. The filed won't be available in PDF Templates, Email Templates and some other tools.

directUpdateDisabled.description: Indicates that updating the field directly is not possible.

foreignAccessDisabled.description: Indicates that access to the field through a link is not feasible.

importDisabled.description: Disables the ability to import the field.

exportDisabled.description: Disables the ability to export the field.

massUpdateDisabled.description: Disables the ability perform mass-update on the field. As of v8.4.

isPersonalData.description: Whether the field may contain personal data.

valueFactoryClassName.description: A factory for value objects. For field types it's defined at metadata > fields. Here you can define a factory for a specific field.

attributeExtractorClassName.description: An extractor for value objects. For field types it's defined at metadata > fields. Here you can define an extractor for a specific field.

detailLayoutIncompatibleFieldList.description: Fields that are incompatible with the subject field on detail view layouts.

converterClassName.description: Converts field defs to ORM metadata. Should implement Espo\Core\Utils\Database\Orm\FieldConverter.

loaderClassName.description: Loader. Must implement Espo\Core\FieldProcessing\Loader. As of v9.1.

duplicatorClassName.description: Duplicates attributes of a field. Some fields can require some processing when an entity is being duplicated. Should implement Espo\Core\Record\Duplicator\FieldDuplicator.

optimisticConcurrencyControlIgnore.description: Ignore optimistic concurrency control. As of v9.1.

additionalAttributeList.description: Additional attributes for a field. Attribute names will be derived by concatenating specified names with the field name.

fullNameAdditionalAttributeList.description: Additional attributes for a field. As of v9.2.

select.description: A custom complex expression to be used for the field when reading from DB. It's possible to define leftJoins and joins that are needed to be applied when the field is being selected.
A complex expression for the SELECT.

order.description: Custom complex expressions to be used when ordering by the field. It's possible to define leftJoins and joins that are needed to be applied.

items.description: A complex expression for the ORDER.

additionalSelect.description: Additional columns to be selected when order by the field is applied.

where.description: Custom where clause to be used when the field is met in a provided where-clause. It's possible to define leftJoins and joins that are needed to be applied. Every comparison operation that you need to support should have its own definitions.

massUpdateActionList.description: Actions for mass update. Overrides the value from fields metadata.

foreignName.description: A field to be used as a name of a foreign record. Needed when a foreign entity type does not have the field name.

audited.description: Linking and unlinking will be logged in the Stream. Available for hasMany.

readOnly.description: Read-only links cannot be edited via link and unlink requests. But they can be edited via link and link-multiple fields.

layoutRelationshipsDisabled.description: Makes the link not available in the Bottom Panels layout (in the Layout Manager tool). Available for hasMany

relationName.description: A relationship name. Defines how a middle table will be named (for a many-to-many relationships). Available for hasMany

columnAttributeMap.description: The mapping of relationship columns to attributes of the foreign entity type.

additionalColumns.description: Additional columns to be created in a middle table (for a many-to-many relationships).

dbType.description: Overrides the type of the DB column.

conditions.description: Where-conditions (for a many-to-many relationships). If multiple links share the same relationship name (middle table), conditions must be defined for each link. For many-to-many.

notMergeable.description: Disable merging related records when duplicate records are being merged. For hasMany, hasChildren.

utility.description: The link will be hidden from a user on the UI but not disabled.

noJoin.description: Prevents joining a foreign table when fetching a record. Available for belongsTo, hasOne.

noForeignName.description: Do not create a foreign name attribute.

noIndex.description: Do not create an index for an ID attribute.

midKeys.description: Middle keys. The second is the foreign middle key.

orderBy.description: An attribute or expression to order by. Applied when getting related entities from an entity. As of v9.0.

deferredLoad.description: When getting a related entity from an entity, it will be returned without loaded values. Values will be loaded on accessing. For belongsToParent there's the downside that it can return an entity even if it's deleted.

items.description: A table or link. Table  CamelCase, link  camelCase.
